  • Classes in grafioschtrader.reportviews.performance used by grafioschtrader.reports
    Class
    Description
    FirstAndMissingTradingDays
    Comprehensive trading day metadata for performance report validation and date selection.
    PerformancePeriod
    Contains comprehensive data for period performance analysis including aggregated metrics, daily changes, and structured period windows for visualization and reporting.
    WeekYear
    Enumeration defining aggregation periods for performance analysis and reporting.
  • Classes in grafioschtrader.reportviews.performance used by grafioschtrader.reportviews.performance
    Class
    Description
    FirstAndMissingTradingDays
    Comprehensive trading day metadata for performance report validation and date selection.
    HolidayMissing
    Enumeration defining the status of trading days for performance analysis and reporting.
    IPeriodHolding
    Projection interface representing daily aggregated holdings and performance metrics for trading dates, usable both per individual portfolio and across the entire tenant.
    PerformanceChartDayDiff
    Data point for charting daily performance differences in period performance analysis.
    PeriodHoldingAndDiff
    Data container for period holding values and computed differences used in performance analysis.
    PeriodStepMissingHoliday
    Represents a period step with holiday or missing data classification.
    PeriodWindow
    Represents a structured time window for performance analysis, typically spanning a single year or week.
    WeekYear
    Enumeration defining aggregation periods for performance analysis and reporting.
